front.title: Circular of the Bureau of Standards no. 488 section 1: an ultraviolet multiplet table- the spectra of hydrogen, helium, lithium, berylluim, boron, carbon, nitrogen, oxygen, fluorine, neon, sodium, magnesium, aluminum, silicon, phosphorus, sulfur, chlorine, argon, potassium, calcium, scandium, titanium, and vanadium
